review_reason: Fundamental proof strategy issue: boxPositive box-closure sub-case cannot prove 'closed' branch when foldl creates new positions that lack theta. The invariant WorklistClosureInvariant may need revision, or the proof needs a different decomposition. See handoff for details.

artifacts.summary: Closure.lean with helper lemmas (foldl_fam_general, hasPosition_backward, ne_self) and partially restructured boxPositive case

partial_progress.details: Iteration 3: Added 5 helper lemmas (all compile). Partially restructured boxPositive box-closure case. Discovered fundamental proof strategy issue: old 'closed' invariant doesn't extend when foldl creates new positions. 103 errors remain (same count, different distribution). Handoff written.

errors.message: boxPositive box-closure: when old invariant says 'closed' and foldl creates new positions at (f', item.timeIdx) where f' had no position before, theta is not at the new position and no pending work item exists. The invariant may need revision.
errors.recommendation: Check if familyIndices guarantees hasPosition at the relevant time, or revise WorklistClosureInvariant to track positions more precisely.
